Articles.Content:
Hello, everyone!

First of all, thank you very much for your patience! The Server Migration now is done and finally completed! 8) :w00t:

All the site, including the Forum and Wiki, was moved to a better server that we hope can handle all the traffic that we were having last weeks.

Now you are able to visit KSP's web site again and feel free to continue posting in our forums for fun! ;P

Cheers

:cheers: :thumbup:
